thread.title: Mother of ISIS Terrorist Jailed for Supporting Sons Activities on Facebook
thread.title_full: Mother of ISIS Terrorist Jailed for Supporting Sons Activities on Facebook

title: Mother of ISIS Terrorist Jailed for Supporting Sons Activities on Facebook
text:
Mother of ISIS Terrorist Jailed for Supporting Son's Activities on Facebook 
NDTV Sunday 25th October, 2015 
Kuala Lumpur: A 55-year-old mother of an Islamic State terrorist has been jailed for 30 months by a Malaysian court for trying to support terrorist activities by using her Facebook accounts, according to a media report. 
Azizah Md Yusof was sentenced on two counts after she pleaded guilty to the charges yesterday. 
Malaysian High Court judge Justice Kamardin Hashim ordered the sentences to run concurrently from the day Azizah was arrested on April 28 last year, the Malaysian star reported today. 
He ruled that it was the court's duty to consider public interest when meting ou...
